levelList.name: Rimpianto
levelList.desc: [BeforeAttack] Rimuove 1 effetto negativo rimovibile applicato a sé

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Infligge +2 Conteggio [Vibration]; Infligge un ulteriore (Rison-A Ira /3) Conteggio [Vibration]

levelList.name: Rimpianto
levelList.desc: [BeforeAttack] Rimuove 1 effetto negativo rimovibile applicato a sé

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Infligge +2 Conteggio [Vibration]; Infligge un ulteriore (Rison-A Ira /3) Conteggio [Vibration]

[OnSucceedAttack] Innesca [VibrationExplosion]
Se il bersaglio non ha una Soglia di Vacillamento durante l'innesco di [VibrationExplosion],
infligge danno da Ira pari al (6 + 2x(Rison-A Ira))% di quanto è stata alzata la Soglia di Vacillamento

levelList.name: Rimpianto
levelList.desc: [BeforeAttack] Rimuove 2 effetti negativi rimovibili applicato a sé

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Infligge +3 Conteggio [Vibration]; Infligge un ulteriore (Rison-A Ira /3) Conteggio [Vibration]

[OnSucceedAttack] Innesca [VibrationExplosion]
Se il bersaglio non ha una Soglia di Vacillamento durante l'innesco di [VibrationExplosion],
infligge danno da Ira pari al (12 + 3x(Rison-A Ira))% di quanto è stata alzata la Soglia di Vacillamento

levelList.name: Rimpianto
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Bersaglia casualmente
[BeforeAttack] Se quest'unità ha un effetto negativo su di sé, Peso Attacco +1

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] Innesca [VibrationExplosion]
La quantità di Soglia di Vacillamento che aumenta in base a [VibrationExplosion] incrementa del 30% di [Vibration] sul bersaglio.
Riduce Conteggio [Vibration] di 1.

levelList.name: Strillo Elettrico
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Ottiene +8 Conteggio [Charge]
[EndSkill] Applica +8 Conteggio [Charge] ad un altro alleato con il Conteggio [Charge] minore
- Number of affected allies grows by (highest Envy Reson. - 2) (max 3)

levelList.name: Strillo Elettrico
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain +8 [Charge] Count
[EndSkill] Apply +8 [Charge] Count to 1 other ally with the least [Charge] Count
- Number of affected allies grows by (highest Envy Reson. - 2) (max 4)
- At 4+ (highest Envy Reson.), apply 1 [VioletDamageUp] to self and all affected allies

levelList.name: Strillo Elettrico
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain +12 [Charge] Count
[EndSkill] Apply +8 [Charge] Count to 1 other ally with the least [Charge] Count
- Number of affected allies grows by (highest Envy Reson. - 2) (max <style="highlight">5</style>)
- At 4+ (highest Envy Reson.), apply 1 [VioletDamageUp] to self and all affected allies
<style="highlight">- At 6+ (highest Envy Reson.), apply 1 [VioletDamageUp] to self and all affected allies</style>

levelList.name: Strillo Elettrico
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets Randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain Atk Weight equal to (highest Envy Reson. - 2) (max 2)
[BeforeAttack] If this unit has 10+ [Charge] Count, spend up to 20 [Charge] Count; deal +2% damage for every [Charge] Count consumed (max 40%)

levelList.name: Mircalla Bramante
levelList.desc: [EndSkill] For 3 turns, lose 10 SP at Turn End

coindescs.desc: [WinDuelAttack] Activate [Laceration] on target once (target loses 1 [Laceration] Count)

levelList.name: Mircalla Bramante
levelList.desc:

coindescs.desc: <style="highlight">[OnSucceedAttack] At 4+ highest Reson., activate [Laceration] on target once (target loses 1 [Laceration] Count)</style>
<style="highlight">[OnSucceedAttack] At 4+ highest Reson., activate [Laceration] on target once (target loses 1 [Laceration] Count)</style>
[WinDuelAttack] Activate the target's [Laceration] <style="highlight">(1 + (highest Reson./2)) times. (3 times max; target loses [Laceration] Count equal to the number of times it was activated)

levelList.desc:
<style="highlight">Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 2)</style>

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] At 4+ highest Reson., activate [Laceration] on target once (target loses 1 [Laceration] Count)<style="highlight"></style>

levelList.name: Mircalla Bramante
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[WhenUse] Consume up to 10% of this unit's max HP and deal (HP consumed / 2) damage to all enemies and allies
- At less than 50% of this unit's max HP, inflict and activate 5 [Laceration] on all allies once instead (lose 1 [Laceration] Count). Heal HP equal to the amount of [Laceration] damage dealt to allies

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 [Laceration] on self and the target
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 [Laceration] on self and the target
- If target did not have [RoseWedge], inflict 4 additional [RoseWedge] Potency
[WinDuelAttack] Activate [Laceration] on target once (target loses 1 [Laceration] Count)
